11:02 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: vmassol I guess it's time to create an HTML5 renderer  
11:02 <gdelhumeau> because we can still keep the <tt> tag in XHTML  
11:02 <gdelhumeau> what is the less costly way to acheive this?  
11:03 <gdelhumeau> since HTML5 is very close to XHTML anyway?  
11:03 <vmassol> create a ne component and extend the XHTML one  
11:03 <vmassol> \*new  
11:03 <vmassol> and override what needs to be overridden  
11:04 <vmassol> actually extend the HTML component probably  
11:04 <vmassol> since you're talking about HTML not XHTML  
11:06 <vmassol> strike that last 2 lines  
11:06 <vmassol> there's no HTML renderer... ;)  
11:06 <vmassol> we always output XHTML  
11:07 <vmassol> so you'd need an HTML 5 renderer  
11:07 <vmassol> you need to implement something similar to XHTMLRenderer  
11:07 <vmassol> and create another class that extends XHTMLChainingRenderer  
11:08 <vmassol> XHTMLChainingRenderer is where all the logic is  
11:08 <vmassol> (rendering logic)  
11:08 <vmassol> for example:  
11:08 <vmassol> in public void beginFormat(Format format, Map<String, String> parameters)  
11:08 <vmassol> you'll see how monospace is handled  
11:09 <vmassol> case MONOSPACE:  
11:09 <vmassol>     getXHTMLWikiPrinter().printXMLStartElement("tt");  
11:09 <vmassol> so you'll need to override beginFormat and check if it's monospace  
11:09 <vmassol> and if not call the parent's beingFormat  
11:09 <vmassol> same for endFormat()  
11:10 <vmassol> (gdelhumeau)  
11:10 <gdelhumeau> yep that's whay I'am going to do  
11:10 <gdelhumeau> Thanks vmassol  
11:10 <gdelhumeau> \*what  
11:11 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: you can look at annotatedxhtml/1.0 renderer for inspiration  
11:11 <tmortagne> and you will need to provide a annotatedhtml/5.0 probably too  
11:14 <vmassol> indeed

14:02 <vmassol> (for example xwiki-rendering-syntax-html should be xwiki-rendering-syntax-html401)  
14:04 <vmassol> maybe we should have xwiki-renderinfg-syntax-html and then subdirs: xwiki-rendering-syntax-html-4.01 and xwiki-rendering-syntax-html-5  
14:04 <vmassol> anyway let's see what thomas remembers
